translations: n．发现者，探险家：发现新事物、新领域或新知识的人。
· The discoverers of the new continent were brave explorers.
新大陆的发现者是勇敢的探险家。

sentences.sentence: The discoverers of GMR have won the 2007 physics Nobel Prize.
sentences.translation: 巨磁电阻效应的发现者获得2007年诺贝尔物理学奖。

sentences.sentence: Frank Hill and his team were the discoverers, 15 years ago, of an east-west jet stream in the sun.
sentences.translation: 弗兰克·希尔和他的研究小组就是15年前太阳内东西高速气流的发现人员。

sentences.sentence: And of course, the week brought the annual celebrations of the first European discoverers of America.
sentences.translation: 当然，这周还带来了对第一个欧洲人发现美洲的年度庆祝活动。
